Information.Name: tabview
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, dialog_2, dialog_3, container, tablecell, form, accordeon, vdomclass, flexcontainer

Language.Sentence: The Tabview type allows storing and displaying the blocks of information, called tabs, in a predefined way.
Order of rendering the object on the page

Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object
The sequence number of the current inserted element
Define if the tabs are shown or not
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99

Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
